discussion.author: FedericoStra
discussion.text: Seems like the name `Dbg` is not ok. The purpose of the package is to expose a macro `@dbg` similar to Rust [`dbg!`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/macro.dbg.html). I can rename the package to `DbgMacro`, if necessary.

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text:
>  I can rename the package to DbgMacro, if necessary.

Yes, that's probably better, thanks!

discussion.author: FedericoStra
discussion.text: This PR is superseded by #33446 and can be closed: I renamed `Dbg` -> `DbgMacro`.
